Introduction to Machine Learning

This document is an introduction to machine learning, a field of study that focuses on the use of algorithms and statistical models to enable machines to perform tasks that typically require human intelligence. The book was written by Alex Smola and S.V.N. Vishwanathan and published by Cambridge University Press in 2008. It covers various topics related to machine learning, including supervised and unsupervised learning, neural networks, and more.

machine learning Alex Smola S.V.N. Vishwanathan
